strings.evolution:
It appears I, one who feels nothing,
have been granted memories.
strings.affinity:
Having thrown away everything, I...
...It's okay, never mind.
Please, have this.
strings.description: A woman indifferent to others who makes a living from selling confidential information about the political instability of the Zoldaad Empire through any means necessary. Having done away with any emotional attachments, Shine often finds herself unable to recall her own upbringing. Many believe her vision sprung forth from the immense pride she has in her own abilities to carry out intelligence gathering missions.
strings.fusion:
...Thanks, as always.
I'll do what I can to pay you
back for this reward.
strings.summon:
So you wish to use my power.
Fine then, what are my orders?

strings.evolution:
You still need me, I see...
Well then, it's a promise.
strings.affinity:
Having thrown away everything, I...
...It's okay, never mind.
Please, have this.
strings.description: A woman with various personas that include a maid who works for the emperor of Zoldaad, and a bar showgirl. Shine is a professional at using her numerous identities to gather intelligence regarding the political state of the empire. Knowing that information can fetch a hefty price in a nation suffering from instability, she sells whatever intel she gathers to whoever offers money for it. The real identity behind the mysterious vision that spawned after she decided to do away with her emotions, however, remains unknown.
strings.fusion:
Is this a reward?
Well then, what should I do now?
strings.summon:
I am a shadow, unable to be seen.
I will carry out my responsibilities.

strings.affinity:
Having thrown away everything, I...
...It's okay, never mind.
Please, have this.
strings.description: A maid who works for the emperor of Zoldaad, the empire that forever burns bright. A callous woman, in truth she is an expert at retrieving confidential information that she then shares with the rebel army opposing the empire, or with whomever pays enough money to procure it. Shine is actually one of the many false identities she has created over the years to carry out her business.
strings.fusion:
I will do my best to pay you back for this reward.
Is that all right with you?
strings.summon:
It doesn't matter who I am or you are.
Let's just take care of business.
